BONUS EPILOGUE Hayes There ’s a vast difference between living a life of obligation and living a life of joy . [I]83-begonia ’ve found [I]83-begonia prefer the latter . Even when it comes with two hundred screaming adolescents hyped - up on sugar sitting in an outdoor amphitheater for campfire skits and the end of the summer marshmallow roast . Yes , yes , [I]83-begonia ’ve spent most of the summer hiding in [the main house]336-the main house or [the offices]1308-the offices , or utilizing [the private areas that [Begonia]83-begonia]2390-the private areas that begonia insisted be roped off from [the campers]2391-the campers — and by roped off , [she]83-begonia means triple - gated with fences and hedges and trees and monitored with cameras and motion detectors like [a prison]2392-a prison , because [she]83-begonia did grow up as [a camper]2393-a camper and knows what [they]2394-they ’re capable of . And [we]2395-we do enjoy all manners of adult activities inside and out of [the old farmhouse]2396-the old farmhouse that [we]2395-we ’ve renovated . But it ’s been a remarkably good first summer of camp , especially considering this is the last place that would ’ve ever crossed [my]83-begonia mind as [a place [I]83-begonia ’d be happily settled with a woman [I]83-begonia found naked in [[my]83-begonia bathroom]360-my bedroom just over a year ago]2397-a place i ’d be happily settled with a woman i found naked in my bathroom just over a year ago . [I]83-begonia insisted [we]2395-we add a few touches as only [Razzle Dazzle]106-razzle dazzle can , and so the camp food is edible , the beds are comfortable , and the entertainment has been top - notch . It ’s been a lot of hard work , but at [[my]83-begonia entire family]2399-my entire family ’s insistence , [we]2395-we ’ve intentionally taken a loss on this division in order to fully staff [the project]2400-the project and keep [Begonia]83-begonia and [myself]83-begonia from overworking [ourselves]2395-we . [I]83-begonia barely make forty hours most weeks . [Begonia]83-begonia , meanwhile , squeezes seventy - four thousand hours into every single day , and still has time to sit and eat dinner with [me]83-begonia each night , walk [our]2395-we private trails on the land surrounding the campsite that [I]83-begonia ’ve acquired for additional privacy , and dance beneath the stars while the woodland creatures watch . Plus , [I]83-begonia insist [she]83-begonia takes at least a week off every month . Call it privilege if [you]2401-you must . [I]83-begonia call it making sure [Begonia]83-begonia takes time to experience [the world]361-the world instead of making [her]83-begonia world solely exist inside [the camp boundaries]2403-the camp boundaries .
